snippet.title: Mad Man With A Plan: A $100 Million River Park In His Hometown
snippet.description: As an advertising executive, Arthur Selkowitz once sold Crest, computers, even Howard Stern. Now he's pitching a passion project--a $100 million river park for his hometown. read »

snippet.description: Want a secret to success? Go look in the mirror. Yes -- you are a key component on whether you make it or not in the shark infested world of entrepreneurship.

snippet.title: Inbee Park, Sebonack Golf Club Stage A Historic U.S. Women's Open
snippet.description: Inbee Park plays her tee shot on the second hole during the final round at the 2013 U.S. Women's Open at Sebonack Golf Club in Southampton, N.Y. on Sunday, June 30, 2013. (Copyright USGA/Darren Carroll) Southampton, New York is known as the glamorous vacation destination for some of the wealthiest people [...] read »

snippet.title: America's Top Backpack And Stroller Neighborhoods
snippet.description: (Forbes Image) Summer is ending, and kids across the country are grabbing their backpacks and trudging off to school. In many suburban neighborhoods, the backpacks come out in full force. But in some city neighborhoods – even those where the sidewalks are full of strollers – backpack-toting kids are scarce. That’s [...] read »

snippet.title: How Not To Cover Sandy, Or Any Natural Disaster
snippet.description: Historically violent weather is converging on the most densely populated part of North America, resulting in emergency declarations and evacuation orders. To New York magazine, though, it's just another opportunity for indulging in class resentment and hipster hating. read »
